items.title: Intelligent Code Generation

items.description: Support for 50+ programming languages including Python, JavaScript, Java, Go, Rust, and more, meeting the development needs of different technology stacks.

items.title: Agentic Programming
items.description: AI programming assistant with multi-turn interaction, intelligent planning, and autonomous decision-making capabilities, able to understand complex requirements and provide optimal solutions.

items.title: Long Context Understanding
items.description: Support for 256K tokens of long context, expandable to 1M tokens, capable of understanding and processing complete codebases of large projects.

items.title: Deep IDE Integration
items.description: Seamlessly integrate with mainstream IDEs like VS Code, IntelliJ, Vim, providing plugins, APIs, and command-line tools to fit into your development workflow.

items.title: Enterprise-Grade Security
items.description: SOC 2 Type II compliant, AES-256 encryption, code privacy protection, on-premises deployment support, meeting enterprise-level security requirements.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Qwen3-Coder

items.question: What is Qwen3-Coder?
items.answer: Qwen3-Coder is Alibaba's next-generation AI programming assistant based on the Qwen3 large model architecture. It has powerful code generation, understanding, and optimization capabilities, supports 50+ programming languages, and can engage in multi-turn conversational interactions to help developers throughout the entire development process from requirement analysis to code implementation.

items.question: What are Agentic programming capabilities?
items.answer: Agentic programming is a core feature of Qwen3-Coder, which has autonomous thinking, planning, and decision-making capabilities. It can engage in multi-turn conversations, understand complex requirements, autonomously decompose tasks, call tools and APIs, and even self-correct and optimize. This makes it not just a code generator, but an intelligent programming partner.

items.question: Which programming languages and frameworks are supported?
items.answer: Qwen3-Coder supports 50+ programming languages, including Python, JavaScript, TypeScript, Java, C++, Go, Rust, Swift, Kotlin, and more. It also supports mainstream frameworks such as React, Vue, Angular, Django, Spring Boot, Express.js, Flutter, React Native, and cloud-native technology stacks.

items.question: How powerful is the long context capability?
items.answer: Qwen3-Coder supports 256K tokens of long context, expandable to 1M tokens. This means it can understand and process complete codebases of large projects, maintain contextual consistency, perform cross-file code analysis and refactoring, and truly understand the overall architecture of projects.

items.question: How does it integrate with existing development environments?
items.answer: Qwen3-Coder provides multiple integration methods: VS Code plugin, IntelliJ IDEA plugin, Vim/Neovim plugin, Qwen Code command-line tool, REST API and SDK. It supports collaborative use with tools like GitHub Copilot and Claude Code, seamlessly integrating into your development workflow.

items.question: How is enterprise-level security guaranteed?
items.answer: Qwen3-Coder complies with SOC 2 Type II standards, uses AES-256 encryption, and supports on-premises and private cloud deployment. Code privacy is strictly protected and will not be used for model training. It provides enterprise-level security features such as audit logs, access control, and data residency.

items.question: What is the pricing model?
items.answer: We offer flexible pricing plans: the free version provides basic features, the personal professional version is suitable for independent developers, the team version supports collaboration features, and the enterprise version provides customized services and on-premises deployment. All versions include core AI programming capabilities, billed by usage or subscription model.

items.question: How is the quality of generated code guaranteed?
items.answer: Qwen3-Coder is optimized through Agent RL technology and performs excellently in authoritative benchmarks such as SWE-Bench Verified. The generated code follows best practices, includes complete error handling, security checks, performance optimization, and detailed comments. It supports code review, test case generation, and refactoring suggestions.
